posts.post_title: WTB: Low grade Raw T206 Chase and/or HOFers
posts.post_content:
Interested in buying raw t206s HOFers (not really looking for inner circle HOF types; looking more for the more affordable HOFers like Joss, Waddell, Bresnahan etc.) and raw t206 Hal Chase cards. PM me if you think you might have a match.

Thanks,
Colco
